name: Free Skate
description:
Please keep in mind that this game is a prototype. Not much content yet. Just getting the basic functions of the game down. As of now, you should be able to join games with anyone that has the same version of the game as you. Updates will be frequent.

!!IMPORTANT!!

  • To have other players' games show up in the Rooms selections area, you may need to have them create the game at the same time that you are viewing the Rooms selections area
  • It is possible to play with people on servers even when the game updates. The only requirement is that the host of the game must be on the same game version as you are. Rooms that are not the same game version will not show up to be joined.

Game Info

  • The yellow bar is your energy
  • The purple bar is your experience
  • The number in the top left is your level
  • To level up, you must have a full experience bar. To get a full experience bar, keep doing tricks! Once your bar is full, take it to the skate shop and press "e" and you should level up. Doing tricks takes up energy so you must go to your Home and press "e" to refill it.

If you do decide to play

  1. Thank you!
  2. Please let me know about any bugs or just overall improvements that you would like to see in the game
